entry.title: Buckingham Nicks: ‘Frozen Love’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Buckingham Nicks: ‘Frozen Love’

 Best New Music

The only studio album recorded by Lindsey Buckingham and Stevie Nicks as a duo is being re-issued for the very first time TODAY.

Sep. 19

entry.title: Janet Devlin: ‘Houston’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Janet Devlin: ‘Houston’

 Best New Music

“Houston” is a brand new song from Irish-born, London-based Country singer Janet Devlin .

Sep. 18

entry.title: Antaeus: ‘Beautiful Dog’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Antaeus: ‘Beautiful Dog’

 Best New Music

Do you have a young pup who suffers from separation anxiety? If so, we have a real treat to share.

Sep. 17

entry.title: Dijon: ‘Yamaha’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Dijon: ‘Yamaha’

 Best New Music

It’s been a banner year for Dijon : Lending talents to Bon Iver’s SABLE, fABLE, contributing to Justin Bieber’s SWAG, and an upcoming role in Paul Thomas Anderson’s One Batter After…

Sep. 16

entry.title: iLe: ‘Un Amor De Calle’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
iLe: ‘Un Amor De Calle’

 Best New Music

Latin Grammy-winning, Puerto Rican star iLe’s new LP Como Las Canto Yo (How I Sing Them) is due in late October. The album will feature her interpretations of a few favorite boleros.

Sep. 15

entry.title: Jessie Baylin: ‘Wild Life’ (Radio Edit) (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Jessie Baylin: ‘Wild Life’ (Radio Edit)

 Best New Music

Nashville-based pop purveyor Jessie Baylin has shared the stage with artists like Stevie Nicks, The Shins, and Iron & Wine (to name just a few).

Sep. 12

entry.title: Mae Powell: ‘Where Will Love Go?’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Mae Powell: ‘Where Will Love Go?’

 Best New Music

Jazzy vocalist Mae Powell has experienced a major break-up.

Sep. 11

entry.title: Ivy: ‘Heartbreak’ (KCRW Todays Top Tune)
entry.content:
Ivy: ‘Heartbreak’

 Best New Music

To say we’re excited by the prospect of new music from seminal ‘90s/2000s dreampop band Ivy would be an understatement.

Sep. 10
